name: Popcorn Invasion
description:
PSA: After the third comic slide, the scene changes but there is no loading screen. Click once and please be patient!

Objective: Stop the popcorn machine from filling up long enough to make it through your shift!

Controls: Left click to use power ups and make the Aliens explode.

Butter Bomb: Destroy nearby Aliens & Popcorn in a buttery explosion.

Fire Kernel: Click, drag & burn Aliens and Popcorn in your path.

Scoop: Scoop Aliens & Popcorn in the top 70% of the machine.
